description:
Bunji has bought a Sarracenia, a carnivorous plant.  Trying to catch live insects for food, he places a trap in the house and runs around with an insect net, but it doesn`t quite work out.  Dad has brought Bunji and Fumi to the park. While he keeps an eye on the children as they play freely, he suddenly notices that he`s being eyed with suspicion by the other moms. The heater has broken down and Mom can`t work because her hand is too cold.  A hot water bottle that she found in the closet was taken by Grandma. Along with Bunji and Fumi, they try various tricks, but they can`t shake the cold... Fumi is writing what she wants for a christmas present to Santa Claus.  She obsessively lists what she wants, but...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Carnivorous Plant / Debut in a Park / It`s Cold / Writing Wishes to Santa
食虫植物 / 公園デビュー / さむ~い / サンタさんにお願い
